alert.note: Alert for Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 2:13AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Upper Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...From noon today to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible with very low visibility. Some roads may be closed. Frostbite and hypothermia are possible from wind chill values below zero.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for New Mexico can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, 1-800-432-4269, or visiting nmroads.com.
